name: NibView
summary: Super simple, subclassable UIView that automatically loads itself from a nib when placed into Interface Builder (like a Storyboard).
description: This is a super simple pod for those times when you want to create a UIView from a nib (.xib), but you're tired of typing all the extra code to do the automatic loading when you add your custom nib-based view to another view or view controller.
